website_summaries.verdict: Tops the competitors in almost every way: looks, performance, space. Despite a few issues, it's a well-rounded humidor that will suit most cigar enthusiasts' needs.
pros: May not require seasoning for users who don't live in dry climates
cons: The lock has been known to break

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor just be patient!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as my 1st humidor (had several loaners over the years) and didn't want to spend a mint on one. Looks nice, the hygrometer tracks (was a little of but easily adjusted) and has adjustable shelves to hold a variety of cigars. Did an initial seasoning and loaded it up with about 75 cigars- would NOT maintain consistent humidity! Fought and cussed and was getting very dejected thinking it was not sealing properly. Finally calmed down and realized the cigars were settling and after a little over a month, settled in perfectly. Noob mistake; I now add DI water to the humidifier about once a month now and it hold very stable. Great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Allen_B

customer_reviews.title: Substandard hydrometer
customer_reviews.text: This review is based entirely on the substandard quality of the hydrometer that is attached to the humidor. Since the humidor was not actually seasoned, I cannot review neither verify its quality as far as performance is concerned, that is keeping humidity to the expected levels. Going back to the hygrometer, this is a very cheap and inaccurate hygrometer and cannot be calibrated easily and accurately. I would expect, based on the high user ratings, that the humidor would come with a high quality hygrometer. I am disappointed at this purchase as I had high expectations, again based on the user reviews. I am not recommending this humidor.
customer_reviews.author: NkByr.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could actually review this based off of actually using it. But if you're looking to give this as a gift, I wouldn't order it on here. Mine arrived damaged. I didn't have time to check it before I gave it to my husband, but it was really awful seeing him take off the wrap and seeing that the corner was all banged up already. Someone clearly dropped this before putting it into the shipping box and still sent it out. Now it's saying they're out of stock so I'm not even sure I can get a replacement for his gift. Lame. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold humidity, despite my best efforts
customer_reviews.text: This provides a very poor seal. Glass tops are notorious for letting humidity escape, so I bought some silicone sealant and ran it all the way around the glass, but still no luck. Even with multiple Boveda 69% packs and other hydration systems, it never gets above 62% (according to my recently calibrated digital hygrometer). Either save up and buy a decent humidor or just get a tuperware box. Not worth paying this much for a poorly crafted wooden box.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Humidor at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this humidor for several months now. It holds a steady humidity level with Boveda packs, and seals very well. Even though it said it wasn’t necessary, I seasoned the humidor with Boveda seasoning packs and had no issue. The analog hygrometer was a pain to calibrate, but after some work I was able to get it to match my digital hygrometer. Personally I have a Govee Bluetooth hygrometer inside the box, which is a great addition and let’s me see RH and temperature data down to the minute for the precious 30 days. Thrilled with my purchase, and highly recommend this humidor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very reliable seller!
customer_reviews.text: Product exceeded expectations. Important to also express that Seller is VERY customer friendly so highly recommended! Update March 3, 2017: Used it for a while now and I can reaffirm that this quality product is excellent value, holds the humidity range and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Trying to be objective

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. When it first came in I immediately started the seasoning process. I chose to do the wipe down method and had a lot of success so far. Wiped it down initially closed it for 24 hours then did a second wipe down closed it for another 24 hours and finally put 72% RH boveda packs which worked great. After humidity came down I loaded my cigars and it’s been maintaining 69% so far with no issues. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It came in good condition and does not seem to leak after about a month of ownership. I will say, this unit does not hold anywhere near 100 cigars. I have about 75 cigars in the humidor currently and it is absolutely filled to the brim. I've even had to stack 2 rows on the first tray. It's possible that if you were to take the tray out it would hold 100 cigars, but that seems to defeat the purpose of providing a tray. Either way it's not a terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Take your time breaking it in for perfect results.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and great packing once broke in the humidor works perfect. Very happy with the purchase thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Corey King

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this humidor. The interior humidity was already at 60% when I took it out of the box. so I didn't have to do much seasoning. Just wipe the interior with a sponge soaked with distilled water, like the instructions said then I did it 12 hours later and I was good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful humidor!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this humidor. After prepping it, and a couple broveda packs. My sticks stay at a constant 69% It does exactly what it says it will. I have about 90 smokes in it, and it is tight. I think I've maxxed out its capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weekend warrior
customer_reviews.text: Well... Its a beautiful humidor. Will it work.. Yes.. Is it the best humidor out there.. No. So it's MDF board. I don't think it will do as good of a job as a pure cedar box. But if you're looking at this box then you aren't willing to pay for a true cedar box. But this will due for the weekend warrior. The hygrograph suck so get a different one. But all in all, this humidor will do
customer_reviews.author: BobbyT

customer_reviews.title: Solid Humidor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great humidor. Well constructed all around. Quality cedar throughout. Analog was dead on accurate with the digital I bought. I probably wasted $25 on the digital but hey no worries. I followed the directions to a tee and worked perfect. Both analog and digital at 71 after a couple days. Actually the digital was a little behind? Tip- soak that humidifier and then shake out complete along with the wipe down of the cedar. I wiped down two days in a row. In a couple days it’s perfect. Just trust the directions and be a little patient. Could t be happier. Great product. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very good humidor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the box, seasoned it and was using it in within 24 hours. Seals properly and holds humidity well. The lock and key are almost useless but not a big issue for me. Also the divider for the top rack was too short but the seller is sending me a replacement. Overall great product for the price. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: A great value! It looks as nice as more expensive models and seems to function just as well. My partner likes the humidity gauge feature. It was a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy large humidor
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be far bigger than i need thus far as I havent been able to fill it even once. The humidity remains constant as long as you look at the gauge one a week or so. This humidor seems more solid that a previous one I owned. The lift tray allows you to showcase your nice cigars, while the space below is far large enough to store bulk products. The only thing it could use more of is separators to keep different types of cigars from touching each other.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and construction, not maintaining humidity
customer_reviews.text: This box looks amazing, and smells even better. It is constructed very well. Typical issues (from other reviews) with hygrometer not calibrating or providing accurate readings. Also, after two months of seasoning (from instructions) and with boveda seasoning packs, this still does not maintain humidity at desired levels (verified with digital hyrgrometer). Hoping more seasoning will set in, but this has been a VERY long process.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Man

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: First of all... this a beautiful humidor. It seems well made and so far it is holding humidity. I subtracted a star because the lock is very iffy and feels if used long enough, will break. Additionally, the hygrometer is not accurate. It read 8 to 10 points below what both of my calibrated digital hygrometers read. It's not a deal breaker, but if you cannot supply an accurate hygrometer why even spend the money supplying one? At the very least include one that is adjustable. Overall for the price I like this humidor and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor III

customer_reviews.title: Beatuful box
customer_reviews.text: Would say its the finest one I have ever seen, but when you open it, the veneer on one of the corners already peeled up, I glued it back down, but still a tad fast for that to be happening. Totally worth getting one still, even just for a beautiful storage box
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Solid humidor for the money
customer_reviews.text: This humidor keeps everything at a steady 70% RH. I seasoned it once and haven't had to touch it since. I topped off my Black Ice pies with Cigar Juice a month ago and haven't had a drop yet. And I reach in there at least four times a week. Craftsmanship is nice and it is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mclovin

customer_reviews.title: Humidor works great if PROPERLY SEASONED!
customer_reviews.text: After the first wet down with cigar juice, let it completely dry and wet down again, watch YOUTUBE videos, sometimes takes 3 or more. Wait until completely dry, check with digital hygrometer until RH is where you want it. NOBODY uses the analog hygrometer, even though mine was only off by 1. Add cigars and adjust humidity, NEVER use a foam humidifier! I use only use Heartfelt tubes as they also dehumidify if humidity gets too high. Always keep humidor at least half full. My humidor stays at a constant 68%!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This humidor is very well built and has a wonderful cedar scent when opened. I have had it for a few weeks now and it is maintaining 66% RH (digital meter) with 2 72% Boveda packs. I only gave it 24 hours after seasoning it with distilled water so I may wipe it down once more to get the RH up a bit. Overall very happy with purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend as a gift. He loved it! Unfortunately, the hygrometer is not really accurate. We bought a digital one to keep inside, so the one included is just a nice decoration/touch to it. Overall pleased with the humidor though
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, once seasoned it holds 72%. Looks great and hold between 70 or so cigars since I am using canister type humidifiers and they take up more room plus I am storing large cigars. I would buy another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product but helps to get  additional accessories at time of order
customer_reviews.text: Humidor looks great, seems to be manufactured sturdy. It took several days to season/ calibrate it. Partly because the instructions asked for distilled water (Hardwarestore) and PG Solution (Propylene Glycol Solution for Humidifiers). The latter we had to order separately after the fact. Next time, I would include it with my order to have everything on hand.
customer_reviews.author: app

customer_reviews.title: We ended up buying a plastic storage container that works great. It holds the humidity perfectly at 65% and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidor as a Birthday Gift. After treating the wood, putting in the humidity packs, and trying everything to bring up the humidity, nothing worked. The humidor wouldn't hold the humidity and never got higher than the upper 40%'s. We ended up buying a plastic storage container that works great. It holds the humidity perfectly at 65% and the humidity packs aren't dry after months of the cigars being in there. This a nice humidor, but unfortunately it doesn't do it's main job.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described beautiful
customer_reviews.text: A great buy The Humidor was exactly as advertised. Well appointment and stylish. The seasoning directions were a bit different from my previous humidor, but still very easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Philos

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a two level humidor. Season it properly, with distilled water. I don't recommend putting in 100 cigars because you'll choke it. Great little humidor and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Other's have written better and greatly technical reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for all those before me. They helped me to make what I believe to be a wise purchase. I am very happy with my humidor. 5 Stars hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J.

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a great larger humidor! I bought it because I needed more space for my growing collection and after seasoning, it holds humidity very well. The only complaint, as with all humidors in this price range, is the hydrometer that it comes with. Very difficult to calibrate it, but if you truly care and are passionate about cigars, you’ll have a second hydrometer (hopefully digital) that’s much more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Chandica Phagoo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for a low priced medium sized humidor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for a low priced medium sized humidor. I was able to get the humidor conditioned easily and it is holding the humidity without any problems. Also like the glass top because I put an electronic hygrometer so I can confirm humidity level without having to open case. Would highly recommend this humidor
customer_reviews.author: Todd T.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product! Beautiful design and flawless functionality make this an ideal addition to anyone's growing cigar collection. It was shipped in a perfectly insulated and snug box keeping it stationary throughout the shipping process. Mine arrived in perfect condition without a single ding or dent. I was skeptical about the integrity of the glass seal after reading previous reviews but mine arrived airtight and ready to season. Highly recommend if you are looking for a well priced high quality addition to your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have another humidor with no problems with a gel pack that keeps the temperature at 70% humidty. I bought two gel packs for this one and cant keep it about 60% and it drops to 50% all the time. The key latch is cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: jason ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice humidor, I did have a minor issue but the sellers address all my concerns, Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Pque

customer_reviews.title: The Quality of this is way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The Quality of this is way better than I expected! Holding a 69-72 humidity with tons of room. I did purchase the Caliber IV Digital Hygromter by Western Humidor and its far more accurate than the built in one. Holding steady at 72 with a boveda 72%, 320g pack along with 2 72%, 60g pack and about 30 cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hannum

customer_reviews.title: No Cursing during set up!!
customer_reviews.text: From a wife’s POV- it is beautiful, smells like wood (I like that smell), and fits in a smaller space (so out of the way). My husband is very happy so far (day 3). It appears to be an easy set up (no cursing was involved in the set up). Cigars are now safely sitting in their ‘sauna’ waiting to be chosen!
customer_reviews.author: Keayjo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship and lovely cedar scent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend who just got into smoking cigars and it’s beautiful. The quality is very good and it fits over 25 cigars nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Joycelynne Me a

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a nice case. I'm still seasoning it but so far, I'm impressed. I picked up a digital humidifier so I'll be curious to see how it compares to the built in one.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed and nice looking humidor
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and nice looking humidor. The low price is great for the quality you get! The humidor came with a hydrating unit (not sure what these are called, but you know what I mean) and worked very well right away. I did wipe down the whole unit with a slightly damp sponge (used distilled water), but the instructions said this was not necessary. If I were to do it again I would have followed instructions and NOT wiped the humidor down.
customer_reviews.author: sam hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Big gap when closing lid
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how they send it like this. Obviously poorly made, returned it
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Just follow the directions to season the wood and use boveda packs. Seals great, looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: The wood is beautiful and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. The wood is beautiful and excellent quality! It's very roomy and it was easy to calibrate the hygrometer. I would buy again and recommend it to others to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Renita Bracco

customer_reviews.title: Good humidor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these. That should tell you all you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality always count on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for a good friend. He really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kromidas

customer_reviews.title: Won’t maintain 70.
customer_reviews.text: Never maintains humidity. Tried all kinds of different methods and still won’t go above 50. I need to maintain 70 and it won’t.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Issues but company backs their product
customer_reviews.text: The hygrometer is pretty much for looks only. I have two inside to check, and both read the same-72. The one that comes with this box, didn't season right with the salt, it was low. So i adjusted the screw on the back that it said to do, and had to readjust when I put it back in, since it reads about 8 degrees higher than the other two inside. And as for the lock, my box came with only one screw hole from the lock into the box itself, so it was more or less hanging. But the company was wonderful and looked after my issue promptly to resolve it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great humidor for the price. Looks awesome. Good capacity. After 3 months humidity stays a rock sold 69% using the following process: Used 84% boveda seasoning packets and followed directions exactly. Ignore the built in hygrometer and get a digital one. Use 72% boveda packs after seasoning to maintain. Cannot speak to other humidification/seasoning methods.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lilli

customer_reviews.title: Good little box
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. works well. It was east to season and took no time at all in the humid south
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upgrade from a simple jar type humidor so even though there were some negative reviews I gave this a try. I spent about a week seasoning it and now about a month later it is filled with about 65-70 cigars, has 3 72% boveda packs, and holds at 70, even reaching 72% at times. I am beyond impressed with what im getting with a $60-$70 humidor. I say give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Vetta

customer_reviews.title: It’s roomy and has a well seal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking box, seasoned for 7 days and stayed at 65% which is pretty good in this cold weather. Lots of room, stored about 75 sticks
customer_reviews.author: Phong

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the ability to view what I have inside without opening. It seems to hold humidity well, the box is well made and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: gary christopher porten

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold humidity
customer_reviews.text: I feel like all these reviews are fake. This thing couldn't hold humidity if it was placed in a rain forest. Seasoned twice and upped to a max of 5 Boveda packs and still doesn't get above 60%. Took the cigars out and placed them in a jar with two Boveda packs and right to 68% - 69% it goes. Going to send this hunk of junk back. Don't believe all these reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought this for me and can not recommend enough. Fits around 65 nub cigars. Would be 100 cigarillos not full length cigars. Took me three days to treat and now it works absolutely incredible.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 100 count humidor and after much research decided on the Mantello humidor. I was impressed with the fast shipping and excellent packaging of this item. I found everything as described with easy to read instructions on proper seasoning procedure. I followed the instructions and I am very pleased with the very elegant look as well as how well the humidor holds humidity at proper levels. I highly recommend this humidor and seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read humidity gauge
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my son for his birthday. He LOVES it. He feels it can hold up to 100 cigars. He loves the tightness of it to hold in the correct moisture. The look of it is quite elegant so he is putting in on a special shelf for it. Easy to read humidity gauge. Would definitely recommend this purchase to others.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Overall looks and quality are very good. However, there is a section on the inside lip that appears to be discolored. You can't see it when you close the lid but it is faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Axe

customer_reviews.title: but it's a beautiful unit tight seal & roomy
customer_reviews.text: Too early to write a full review, but it's a beautiful unit tight seal & roomy! Only problemo so far is hard to open, there's no handle! Overall thus far very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: BBQ DADDY

customer_reviews.title: 100 count humidor
customer_reviews.text: Upper tray came apart after seasoning cigar. Had to reglue was entire tray. Must be careful when lifting to view cigars below.
customer_reviews.author: James Malik

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Hold Humidity
customer_reviews.text: I meticulously seasoned this humidor 10 days with 2 shot glasses full of distilled water) as well as confirmed the hygrometer with a Boveda Butler test bag. Humidity has been steadily dropping and I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MFC

customer_reviews.title: Great to carry 100 Cigars
customer_reviews.text: Humidor is large and the humidifier that comes with the box is not enough for the size of the box to keep the humidity levels perfect, I had to add another humidifier and and crystal gels and add it inside the box to maintain the right humidity level.
customer_reviews.author: Kevork Hagopian

customer_reviews.title: Very Large
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his humidor. A very large size as I meant to order a smaller one however he’s had fun filling it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amtilda

customer_reviews.title: The actual box is beautiful and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The actual box is beautiful and very sturdy. lots of room. The lock was horrible. It is flimsy and does not work. I really wanted something that locked so I was very disappointed that it doesnt work well.
customer_reviews.author: DRHILL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the best price ever!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, properly wrapped, no faults, ready to be used. I have just let a shot with water inside the humidor overnight and the following day was ready for usage. For 2 months the humidity has not changed a bit and for security purpose, I double checked with the electronic one and it was exactly the same!! Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: roomy humidor
customer_reviews.text: great humidor to have/ easy to set up with directions sent with humidor will be holding those special cigars that are only used on special occasions
customer_reviews.author: Walter R

customer_reviews.title: Plan on replacing the mechanical gauge with one of quality or enjoy it for entertainment purposes
customer_reviews.text: Humidor tends to need more moisture in the air to stay in the preferred range. It's a small matter once that is worked out. Plan on replacing the mechanical gauge with one of quality or enjoy it for entertainment purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Well made and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My son in law loved this gift. Seems to hold a zillion cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Weisser

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It has worked better than great it holds humidity perfect and looks great, btw buy a digital hygrometer, I did season it properly so make sure you do that:)
customer_reviews.author: david m.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and Excellent storage fo cigars
customer_reviews.text: Product has a nice seal to keep cigars fresh. Great looking. Product holds the amount of cigars stated keeping in mind length and guage of cigars. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jame Lowery

customer_reviews.title: The box is good quality and the viewing window is a great feature
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of cigar boxes before buying this one. You will need to purchase a hydrometer to keep on the top shelf but after box was seasoned I have had no problem keeping it at a steady 70%. The box is good quality and the viewing window is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: The 1st Amazon shipment had a missing part (humidifier insert). I returned it and received a 2nd humidor which was fine. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sutin

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the lock broke within a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 4 stars because of the lock broke within weeks. But no biggy, so far I still like the box, great smell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Shadwick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and roomy
customer_reviews.text: It looks even better than pictures. I really appreciate that the humidistat came precalibrated, too. What a great way to keep my cigars fresh. Thanks for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Kock

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cigar box. Great value. Seems to be holding the humidity well. Just seasoned it and will be some time before it settles but so far so good. I may buy another if this goes well. I have been buying cubans when I travel abroad and i would rather have a few smaller humidors than one big one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect humidor for home or office
customer_reviews.text: This humidor is perfect for use in my home. After I seasoned it holds RH perfectly. Very well constructed. Seals tightly. Glass window on top allows you to display some of your better cigars on a removable tray. I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gehring

customer_reviews.title: Quality is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality is better than I expected! Holding humidity perfectly and has a lot of room. Purchased a digital hygrometer and its far more accurate than the built in one. Holding steady at 69 with 3 boveda 69% packs and about 50 sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Consistent RH
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if you can fit 100 cigars but only time will tell. After seasoning the humidor it has stayed pretty consistent at 72% RH.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Got it on Nov. 4th. Having it seasoned as we speak. Will update at how it holds humidity levels. Bit so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, as described and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, as described and well worth the price. Lid fits tightly to humidor, and the gold key with black tassel is very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidor for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: The humidor itself is great, especially for the price. Hygrometer is analog and hard to adjust. Salt test for three days and I was able to dial it in. 100 cigars probably not, 60-80 all day long. I'm buying a digital Hygrometer and calling it good. Overall, for the price, nice unit, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I do know much about these items but my son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product bad tray design
customer_reviews.text: Im doing kind of a odd review. I roll my own cigarettes and store them in this product. It works great, keeps the perfect humidity, stores over 3 cartons of roll your own cigarette. I use to have a 50 cigar humidor (a cheap one) didnt hold the humidity like this product at all. The only downside is the lift out tray doesnt have any handles so if you have it full of cigars (or cigarettes) then its impossible to lift the tray out. Other then that it would have 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly made. Cheaper on Amazon than other places. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett B.

customer_reviews.title: a few steps to take before using
customer_reviews.text: unless you've had one before....before putting in cigars watch a short youtube video on the humidor. Very easy and helpful
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 100 Cigars is a stretch. But it does house 70ish verry well at the right humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Paul@Austin

customer_reviews.title: Won't keep humidity levels high enough
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a month now and so far I can't get it past 65% humidity, not even with the Boveda 84% packet to season the humidor. I'm not impressed with the Boveda products either but as much as I like the looks of the box, I may have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chipack

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but impossible to maintain 70%
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. It is impossible to season and maintain 70% humidity in this humidor.
customer_reviews.author: WDB

customer_reviews.title: Overall great Humidor. Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Humidor came in as pictured online. Definitely well made as it has a tight seal. Seasoned it and put in my cigars. However, Humidor reads at the "Ideal" marker on the Analog Hygrometer but my Digital Hygrometer reads a consistent 63%... Not sure if it is the humidor that doesn't hold the Humidity well or my hygrometer is off. Overall great Humidor. Does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The humidor is high quality and works great! I recommend using bovada packs to keep the humidor the proper humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: "A Proper Addition!"
customer_reviews.text: I "actually" was not looking for another humidor, but when I saw this particular one, I said I had to have it. A simple nice addition to the family.
customer_reviews.author: Kinggenesis1

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried by far
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift and was very pleased. Seals cigars beautifully and looks awsome, I had my sister personalize it for an extra touch but very pleased with it and so was him.
customer_reviews.author: Unkown

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor, you don't need anything more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This thing WORKS. I have had two humidors that cost HUNDREDS of dollars and I could not get them to maintain the correct humidity no matter what I did. You don't need anything fancy. This thing seals really tight and maintains the correct humidity.
customer_reviews.author: C. Holliday

customer_reviews.title: No Problems!
customer_reviews.text: I use a few 69% boveda packs and it holds the humidity perfectly at 69 RH! Also it’s a very beautiful humidor on any desk!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Really nice! But missing the key
customer_reviews.text: The box itself is really nice, air tight, and looks beautiful. The only issue is mine didn’t come with a key for the lock which is disappointing because I can’t find any contact info and don’t want to have to return the entire unit for a key.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this one...best one I've had out of three previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: Judah Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Will not properly season
customer_reviews.text: Pure garbage. I spent 2 week meticulously seasoning with bovida packs and it dried them up without properly seasoning (yes, I used the correct amount for a humidor this size....4 of the 84% seasoning packets). After it failed to season properly, I added a few shot glasses full of distilled water to help the process along. Still it doesn't season. After taking these measures and watching it for weeks, it clearly isn't going to work. I attempted a return to find that I'm 1 day past the return threshold. Of course I am! Would not recomend
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice humidor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice humidor. However, unless you have a bunch of small cigars, you will not fit 100.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Bahe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my parents and they loved it
customer_reviews.author: Jonnalie

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great.
customer_reviews.text: Holds Humidity well (I use boveda 320 69% and it's own humidifier together). High quality material. Good build. Plenty of space with upper and lower dividers. Only downside is the lock mechanism isn't spot on but that doesn't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bough 2 more. One for me and one for my nephew as a gift. Trust me for the money it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. If you need a humidor buy this one. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

product_meta.title: Mantello Large Glass-Top Cigar Humidor Humidifier Box with Hygrometer and Cedar Tray - Holds (50-100 Cigars)
product_meta.description: This humidor can hold up to 100 cigars depending on their size. It comes with a cedar shelf and dividers that allow you to efficiently utilize the space to achieve that 100 cigar capacity. The humidor also comes equipped with a locking lid, humidifier inside and hygrometer mounted on the exterior.
feature_bullets: Holds Up To 100 Cigars depending on the Ring Gauge
Spanish Cedar Lining, Tempered Glass Top, Solid Brass Hinges
Removable Tray With Divider, Felt-lined Bottom, Lock & Key Set
Includes Humidor, Humidifier, Tray, and Divider. Cigars Not Included
Approximate Humidor Exterior Dimensions: 13.5 x 9.4 x 6.3 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars692 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
